features: Thoroughly Cleanses Skin and Beards: Natural charcoal face wash specially formulated for men to thoroughly cleanse skin and beards
Long-Lasting Clean Feel: This gel face wash can be used on beards and mustaches for a long-lasting clean feel without leaving skin feeling dry or tight
Vanilla and Bourbon Scent: Face gel wash with a masculine and modern vanilla and bourbon scent
Natural Charcoal Enriched: Beard and face wash for men enriched with Natural Charcoal removes dirt and excess oil from the face
body.description: Take care of your skin with NIVEA MEN DEEP Cleansing Beard and Face Wash. This NIVEA face cleanser is specially formulated for men to thoroughly cleanse skin and beards. Enriched with Natural Charcoal, this daily face wash formula removes dirt and excess oils, leaving a long-lasting clean feel. NIVEA MEN Face Wash cleanses skin and beard hair to leave skin refreshed without feeling tight or dry. This NIVEA face wash for men features a masculine and modern vanilla and bourbon scent everyone will love. A deep cleansing face wash and beard wash is a key part of a skin care routine and pairs well with NIVEA MEN DEEP Clean Shaving Gel and Comforting Post Shave Lotion. To use, lather NIVEA MEN's face wash, massage over wet face, and rinse facial cleanser off with water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: As I started growing a beard my skin was breaking out. Using Nivea cleared it up right away. I love the scent. I use Nivea shave cream and aftershave, I love their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best I've found so far
reviews.reviewText: I have really weird skin, super oily one week, super dry the next, its also rather sensitive and very prone to break outs and white heads. I've spent a long time and a lot of money trying to find a decent cleaner that works. This stuff does the trick. I've been using it for a couple years now and have had no reason to look any further.... it also works as a good beard shampoo (leaves my THICK goatee soft and clean, saving money on beard conditioners)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, but not as good as the way it originally used to be.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product for a while now, and this time I felt like the quality was somewhat compromised. The face-wash gel was a little lighter than it used to be and it mostly made my skin dry after wash. One good thing was it It has an enhanced scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wash my beard and face with this during my shower. Works great. Keeps beard itch and dandruff away. I have sensitive skin but I dont have a problem using this. Leaves my beard soft and my skin hydrated. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, great scent
reviews.reviewText: The cost alone is worth the price of admission plus small enough for air travel. The wash is gel like with a black tint. I like the fact that it doesn't stain the shower tile like some others I have used which takes a little bit of scrubbing to get off. The scent is especially strong and masculine somewhat like a cologne. It leaves my skin feeling smooth and clean, not dry or irritated one bit. I also have a large beard and doesn't seem to effect that negatively either. Overall, I am satisfied with the purchase and would buy again. 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I love this one, I am using this one for years, glad to find it in amazon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent face wash; weak packaging quality
reviews.reviewText: Weak quality control - the seam at the top was broken on all three tubes. The first time I used it I got face wash all over the place because it came out of both ends. I thought I must have gotten a dud or it got damaged in shipping but when all three had the same leak in the same spot this seemed like a bigger problem. I can use the tube and the product is decent, I just don’t have to open the cap to get the product out. Won’t buy again, at least not in this form.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023

reviews.reviewText: It is scented ( decent scent) was expecting more thicker charoal. This is some salliluic / charcoal mixture. Overall ok.

Buenos pero algo caros, la verdad es que es un jabón facial bastante bueno, me gusta como deja la piel, lo único malo que tiene es la fragancia, siento que podría oler un poco menos, no huele mal, huele bien pero me pasa después de un rato sigo sintiendo el aroma en mi nariz, y no es tan agradable, otra desventaja es que es muy caro, llevo una semana usándolo y siento que ya le baje mucho al primero que usé, pero, lo recomiendo.
